description: Text to Speech extension allows you to use the system's Text-to-Speech features to read any text aloud.
name: TextToSpeech
shortDescription: An extension to enable the use of Text-to-Speech features.

eventsFunctions.description: Speaks a text message aloud through the system text-to-speech.
eventsFunctions.name: Speak
eventsFunctions.sentence: Say _PARAM1_ with voice _PARAM2_, volume _PARAM3_%, rate _PARAM4_% and pitch _PARAM5_%

parameters.longDescription:
Voices vary depending on the operating system. 
Here is a list of windows voice names: https://bit.ly/windows-voices 
And here is a list of voice names for MacOS: https://bit.ly/mac-voices
parameters.name: Voice

eventsFunctions.description: Forces all Text-to-Speech to be stopped.
eventsFunctions.name: StopSpeaking
